front.title: Basic Requirements for IPv6 Customer Edge Routers

author.organization: University of New Hampshire, Interoperability Lab (UNH-IOL)

abstract.t: This document specifies requirements for an IPv6 Customer Edge (CE) router. Specifically, the current version of this document focuses on the basic provisioning of an IPv6 CE router and the provisioning of IPv6 hosts attached to it. The document obsoletes RFC 7084.
